description:
Like Priest Geo, he is one of the Five Heroes of Metallicana who fought in the Golem War, attracted by the aspirations of Prince Lars. Later, he became the Seneschal of the Aian Meide. He is a master of the Kyokushin Itto style and his class is Samurai High Master. Joshua is one of his disciples.
Source: Official page
name: Nills Schon Mifune
